question: An electric bulb of 60 W, 120 V is to be connected to 220 V source. What resistance should be connected in series with the bulb, so that the bulb glows properly?
explanation: Rated current of bulb <katex>$I = P/V = 60/120 = 0.5$</katex> A.
Voltage drop required across resistor <katex>$V_R = 220 - 120 = 100$</katex> V.
